invalidPlaceholders: Placeholders in your Excel file and email template do not match.
requiredDataMissing: ToEmails or EmailSubject not provided in input Excel file
noInputRows: No information was found in input Excel file
incorrectInputSheet: Provided sheet name could not be found in the email input file.
logF_BusinessProcessName: Send personalized emails to multiple recipients
automationDescription: This process sends personalized emails based on an email template and information from an Excel file.
